attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Instruct the Department for Transport to, enhance GWML to enable to Trains to travel up to 150 mph Cut the Journey time between Cornwall, Devon, Somerset to London on a new dedicated railway track, which will run along side the existing track as much as possible when feasible to do so.   Creating a new diversion been built between Exeter and Newton Abbot enabling the High Speed Trains to bypassing the Dawlish Sea Wall.

 

With more people moving to the following counties to live it is important to have excellent transport link to London. By introducing this new High Speed line will help to give people a very good alternative to get to London or between the counties. This will to reduce the carbon footprint.

 

With introducing the new local train services this will enable more people to travel by train which will at the end of the day help the local environment.

 

By re-introduce a new train Service linking Oakhampton to Taunton via Exeter with new Railway Stations been built at Collumpton and Wellington and trains stopping at the existing Tiverton Parkway and Tavistock to Plymouth with a future plan to go Launceston.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
